column14: Description
As a restaurant manager, I can manage food record so that I can offer more variety of food to the customers
As a restaurant manager, I can manage seat record so that I can make sure that there is enough chairs and tables in the restaurant
As a restaurant manager, I can manage the staff record so that I can have up-to-date staff details
As a restaurant staff, I can manage customer's payment so that I can make sure that the customer's bill is paid
As a restaurant staff, I can manage customer orders so that I can make sure that the customer orders are correct
As a  restaurant staff, I can manage membership registration so that I can help the restaurant customer to collect loyalty points
As a restaurant staff, I can login to the website so that I can trust the website
column19: Plan the overall database that invovled in the Restaurant System
column25: Populate the tables created with some sample records
column27: Design the home layout for Restaurant System
column29: Write code for the home layout in Netbean
column31: Test the code for home layout to see whether it display the design elements neatly

column41: Insert a JOptionPane message dialog with a message "Successfully Login" when the username and password input match with the retrieved staff record
column43: Insert a JOptionPane message dialog with an error message "No such record exists. Try again"

column14: As a restaurant staff, I can add new customer order so that I can fulfill customer's order request

column14: As a restaurant staff, I can generate receipt to customer so that I can prove that the bill has been paid

column14: As a restaurant staff, I can check out customer's bill so that I can receive payment from customer

column14: As a restaurant staff, I can view customer's order so that I can check whether the food ordered is taken correctly

column14: As a restaurant staff, I can add new membership record so that I can fulfill customer's request to become a member
As a restaurant staff, I can update membership record so that I can have the latest customer's details
As a restaurant staff, I can remove membership record so that I deactivate the member when he or she no longer wants to become a member
As a restaurant staff, I can view the membership record so that I can know the member details such as their loyalty point balance
As a restaurant manager, I can add new food record so that I can make the new food available in the menu
As a restaurant manager, I can update food record so that the food details remained correct and up-to-date
As a restaurant manager, I can view food record so that I can know about the food details
As a restaurant manager, I can add new staff record so that I can keep new staff details in the database
As a restaurant manager, I can update staff record so that I can have latest staff details
As a restaurant manager, I can view staff record so that I know how to contact them through their personal details
As a restaurant manager, I can add new seat record so that I can make sure the database is updated with the latest number of tables
As a restaurant manager, I can update the seat record so that I can set number of chairs for a table
As a restaurant manager, I can view the seat record so that I can know the seat availability status
As a restaurant staff, I can view customer's payment record so that I can know customer's transaction
